ValidationRule.description: If quote is not approved and dually signed, you cannot change a direct opportunity to closed won.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(
$Setup.byPass__c.ByPass_Validation__c = FALSE, $Profile.Name = "Standard Ads User Profile",
OR( RecordType.DeveloperName = $Label.OPP_RECORDTYPEDEVNAME_DIRECT, RecordType.DeveloperName = $Label.OPP_RECORDTYPEDEVNAME_PROGRAMMATIC ),
ISBLANK( Primary_Quote__c ),
ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Closed Won')
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Cannot change stage to Closed Won if a Quote is not present
